StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetProspectHighSchoolResults]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
( @SchoolIds xml = null, @ZipCodes xml = null, @Gender varchar(1) = null, @Gradua.onYear int = null, @OrgId uniqueiden..er = NULL ) AS BEGIN
SET NOCOUNT ON SET ArithAbort ON
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
CREATE TABLE #RESULTS ( ProspectId uniqueiden..er, NwaId int, LastName varchar(75), FirstName varchar(75), MiddleName varchar(75), Gender varchar(1), PrimaryPhoneNumber varchar(25), ProspectStatus varchar(40), ProspectDisposi.on varchar(40), Source varchar(10), Ac.vity varchar(10), ASVABDate date.me, ASVABCareerDec varchar(25), ASVABScore int, O.cerASVABScore .oat, O.cerASVABDate date.me, CareerDecision varchar(50), PrimaryEmailAddress varchar(256), RANK_CODE varchar(10), RecruiterLastName varchar(20), RecruiterFirstName varchar(20), RecruiterMiddleName varchar(20), CellPhoneNumber varchar(25) )
CREATE TABLE #Prospect ( [ProspectId] uniqueiden..er NOT NULL PRIMARY Key, [PersonId] uniqueiden..er NOT NULL, [Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] uniqueiden..er NOT NULL, [Recrui.ngPersonId] uniqueiden..er, [Gradua.onYear] smallint, [ProspectDisposi.onId] smallint, [Ac.vity] varchar(10), [CareerDecision] varchar(50), [Source] varchar(10), [NwaId] uniqueiden..er )
CREATE TABLE #Person ( [PersonId] uniqueiden..er NOT NULL PRIMARY Key, [LastName] varchar(75) NOT NULL, [FirstName] varchar(75), [MiddleName] varchar(75), [Gender] char(1) )
IF @OrgId IS NOT NULL AND @Gradua.onYear IS NOT NULL BEGIN INSERT INTO #Prospect SELECT [ProspectId] ,[PersonId] ,[Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] ,[Recrui.ngPersonId] ,[Gradua.onYear] ,[ProspectDisposi.onId] ,[Ac.vity] ,[CareerDecision] ,[Source] ,[NwaId] FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect pr WHERE pr.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = @OrgId AND pr.Gradua.onYear = @Gradua.onYear END ELSE IF @OrgId IS NOT NULL BEGIN INSERT INTO #Prospect SELECT [ProspectId] ,[PersonId] ,[Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] ,[Recrui.ngPersonId] ,[Gradua.onYear] ,[ProspectDisposi.onId] ,[Ac.vity] ,[CareerDecision] ,[Source] ,[NwaId] FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect pr WHERE pr.Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId = @OrgId END ELSE IF @Gradua.onYear IS NOT NULL BEGIN INSERT INTO #Prospect SELECT [ProspectId] ,[PersonId] ,[Recrui.ngOrganiza.onId] ,[Recrui.ngPersonId] ,[Gradua.onYear] ,[ProspectDisposi.onId] ,[Ac.vity] ,[CareerDecision] ,[Source] ,[NwaId] FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Prospect pr WHERE pr.Gradua.onYear = @Gradua.onYear END
IF @Gender IS NOT NULL BEGIN INSERT INTO #Person SELECT p.[PersonId] ,[LastName] ,[FirstName] ,[MiddleName] ,[Gender] FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Person p INNER JOIN #Prospect pr ON p.PersonId = pr.PersonId WHERE p.Gender = @Gender END ELSE BEGIN INSERT INTO #Person SELECT p.[PersonId] ,[LastName] ,[FirstName] ,[MiddleName] ,[Gender] FROM PROSPECTING.USMC.Person p INNER JOIN #Prospect pr ON p.PersonId = pr.PersonId END
IF @SchoolIDs IS NOT NULL BEGIN CREATE TABLE #SchoolsTable (ID uniqueiden..er) INSERT INTO #SchoolsTable (ID) SELECT ParamValues.ID.value('.','VARCHAR(36)') FROM @SchoolIds.nodes('/Schools/id') as ParamValues(ID)
INSERT INTO #RESULTS SELECT DISTINCT Pr.ProspectId, nwa1.Nwa_Id AS NwaId, P.LastName, P.FirstName, P.MiddleName, P.Gender, PP_PRIMARY.PhoneNumber as PrimaryPhoneNumber, 'Prospect' AS ProspectStatus, pdt.ProspectDisposi.onType AS ProspectDisposi.on, pr.Source, pr.Ac.vity, (SELECT Top 1 [ExamDate] FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID] AND [ExamType] = 'A' AND ExamDate = (SELECT Max(ExamDate) FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ExamType] = 'A' AND [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID]) ) as ASVABDate, (SELECT Top 1 [CareerDecision] FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID] AND [ExamType] = 'A' AND ExamDate = (SELECT Max(ExamDate) FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ExamType] = 'A' AND [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID]) ) as ASVABCareerDec, (SELECT Top 1 [Score] FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID] AND [ExamType] = 'A' AND ExamDate = (SELECT Max(ExamDate) FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ExamType] = 'A' AND [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID]) ) as ASVABScore, (SELECT Top 1 [Score1] FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectProfessedExam] WHERE [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID] AND [ProspectProfessedExamType] = 'A' ) as O.cerASVABScore, (SELECT Top 1 [ExamDate] FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectProfessedExam] WHERE [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID] AND [ProspectProfessedExamType] = 'A' ) as O.cerASVABDate, pr.CareerDecision as CareerDecision, PE_PRIMARY.EmailAddress as PrimaryEmailAddress, RP.RANK_CODE, PERSON.LAST_NAME as RecruiterLastName, PERSON.FIRST_NAME as RecruiterFirstName, PERSON.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME as RecruiterMiddleName, PP_CELL.PhoneNumber as CellPhoneNumber FROM #Person p INNER JOIN #Prospect pr on (p.PersonID = pr.PersonID) INNER JOIN [usmc].[ProspectSchool] ps on (pr.ProspectId = ps.ProspectId) INNER JOIN #SchoolsTable st ON st.ID = ps.SchoolId INNER JOIN [usmc].[ProspectDisposi.on] pdt on (pr.ProspectDisposi.onId = pdt.ProspectDisposi.onId) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON RP on (Pr.Recrui.ngPersonId = RP.rowguid) LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person PERSON on (RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=PERSON.PERSON_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[PersonPhone] PP_PRIMARY ON ((PP_PRIMARY.PersonId = P.PersonId) AND (PP_PRIMARY.PersonPhoneTypeId = 1)) LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[PersonPhone] PP_CELL ON ((PP_CELL.PersonId = P.PersonId) AND (PP_CELL.PersonPhoneTypeId = 3)) LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[PersonEmail] PE_PRIMARY ON ((PE_PRIMARY.PersonId = P.PersonId) AND (PE_PRIMARY.PersonEmailTypeId = 1)) LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA nwa1 ON pr.NwaId = nwa1.rowguid
DROP TABLE #SchoolsTable END ELSE IF @ZipCodes IS NOT null BEGIN CREATE TABLE #ZipCodesTable (ID varchar(5)) INSERT INTO #ZipCodesTable (ID) SELECT ParamValues.ID.value('.','VARCHAR(5)') FROM @ZipCodes.nodes('ZipCodes/id') as ParamValues(ID)
INSERT INTO #RESULTS SELECT DISTINCT Pr.ProspectId, nwa1.Nwa_Id AS NwaId, P.LastName, P.FirstName, P.MiddleName, P.Gender, PP_PRIMARY.PhoneNumber as PrimaryPhoneNumber, 'Prospect' AS ProspectStatus, pdt.ProspectDisposi.onType AS ProspectDisposi.on, pr.Source, pr.Ac.vity, (SELECT Top 1 [ExamDate] FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID] AND [ExamType] = 'A' AND ExamDate = (SELECT Max(ExamDate) FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ExamType] = 'A' AND [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID]) ) as ASVABDate, (SELECT Top 1 [CareerDecision] FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID] AND [ExamType] = 'A' AND ExamDate = (SELECT Max(ExamDate) FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ExamType] = 'A' AND [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID]) ) as ASVABCareerDec, (SELECT Top 1 [Score] FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID] AND [ExamType] = 'A' AND ExamDate = (SELECT Max(ExamDate) FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] WHERE [ExamType] = 'A' AND [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID]) ) as ASVABScore, (SELECT Top 1 [Score1] FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectProfessedExam] WHERE [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID] AND [ProspectProfessedExamType] = 'A' ) as O.cerASVABScore, (SELECT Top 1 [ExamDate] FROM [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectProfessedExam] WHERE [ProspectID] = pr.[ProspectID] AND [ProspectProfessedExamType] = 'A' ) as O.cerASVABDate, pr.CareerDecision as CareerDecision, PE_PRIMARY.EmailAddress as PrimaryEmailAddress, RP.RANK_CODE, PERSON.LAST_NAME as RecruiterLastName, PERSON.FIRST_NAME as RecruiterFirstName, PERSON.LEGAL_MIDDLE_NAME as RecruiterMiddleName, PP_CELL.PhoneNumber as CellPhoneNumber FROM #Person P INNER JOIN #Prospect pr on (p.PersonID = pr.PersonID) INNER JOIN [usmc].[ProspectSchool] ps on (pr.ProspectId = ps.ProspectId) INNER JOIN mcriss.dbo.high_SCHOOL hs on hs.rowguid = ps.SchoolId INNER JOIN #ZipCodesTable zt ON zt.ID = Le.(HS.ZIP_CODE,5) INNER JOIN [usmc].[ProspectDisposi.on] pdt on (pr.ProspectDisposi.onId = pdt.ProspectDisposi.onId) INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.RECRUITING_PERSON RP on (Pr.Recrui.ngPersonId = RP.rowguid) LEFT OUTER JOIN [PROSPECTING].[USMC].[ProspectNonMEPSProfessedExam] pe on (pr.ProspectId = pe.ProspectId) LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Person PERSON on (RP.RECRUITING_PERSON_ID=PERSON.PERSON_ID) LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[PersonPhone] PP_PRIMARY ON ((PP_PRIMARY.PersonId = P.PersonId) AND (PP_PRIMARY.PersonPhoneTypeId = 1)) LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[PersonPhone] PP_CELL ON ((PP_CELL.PersonId = P.PersonId) AND (PP_CELL.PersonPhoneTypeId = 3)) LEFT OUTER JOIN [USMC].[PersonEmail] PE_PRIMARY ON ((PE_PRIMARY.PersonId = P.PersonId) AND (PE_PRIMARY.PersonEmailTypeId = 1)) LEFT OUTER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.NWA nwa1 ON pr.NwaId = nwa1.rowguid
DROP TABLE #ZipCodesTable END
SELECT cs.NWA_ID, MAX(cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID) as CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID INTO #CandidateMaxStatus FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs INNER JOIN #RESULTS n ON n.NwaId = cs.NWA_ID GROUP BY cs.NWA_ID
SELECT cs.* INTO #CandidateStatus FROM MCRISS.dbo.CANDIDATE_STATUS cs INNER JOIN #CandidateMaxStatus cs2 ON cs.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID = cs2.CANDIDATE_STATUS_ID
/* Add prospect comments and status/disposi.on */ SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By R.LASTNAME, R.FIRSTNAME), R.*, ProspectStatus AS Status, ProspectDisposi.on AS Disposi.on, pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on AS Comment, pc.ProspectDate AS LastCommentDate, pc.Comment as Notes FROM #RESULTS r LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.ProspectComment pc ON r.ProspectId = pc.ProspectId AND (pc.ProspectDate IN ( SELECT MAX(pc2.ProspectDate) FROM USMC.ProspectComment pc2 WHERE pc2.ProspectId = pc.ProspectId AND pc2.ProspectId IS NOT null AND pc2.ProspectDate IS NOT NULL ) ) LEFT JOIN USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac on pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId LEFT JOIN USMC.ProspectCommentType pct on pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId WHERE r.NwaId IS NULL
UNION ALL
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(Order By R.LASTNAME, R.FIRSTNAME), R.*, sd.Status_Descrip.on AS Status, sd.Disposi.on_Descrip.on AS Disposi.on, pct.ProspectCommentDescrip.on AS Comment, pc.ProspectDate AS LastCommentDate, pc.Comment as Notes FROM #RESULTS r LEFT OUTER JOIN USMC.ProspectComment pc ON r.ProspectId = pc.ProspectId AND (pc.ProspectDate IN ( SELECT MAX(pc2.ProspectDate) FROM USMC.ProspectComment pc2 WHERE pc2.ProspectId = pc.ProspectId AND pc2.ProspectId IS NOT null AND pc2.ProspectDate IS NOT NULL ) ) LEFT JOIN USMC.ProspectAc.vityComment pac on pac.ProspectAc.vityCommentId = pc.ProspectAc.vityCommentId LEFT JOIN USMC.ProspectCommentType pct on pct.ProspectCommentTypeId = pac.ProspectCommentTypeId INNER JOIN #CandidateStatus cs ON r.NwaId = cs.NWA_ID INNER JOIN MCRISS.dbo.Status_Disposi.on sd on sd.Status_Type = cs.Status_Type AND sd.Disposi.on_Code = cs.Disposi.on_Code WHERE r.NwaId IS NOT NULL
DROP TABLE #RESULTS DROP TABLE #CandidateStatus DROP TABLE #CandidateMaxStatus
DROP TABLE #Person DROP TABLE #Prospect
END
